comment.author: 30307538@N00
comment._content: I have just come across a manuscript written by Florence Byram Dulion Smith, my grandmother, that was written about Harriet Bedell with information taken from the book, A Woman Set Apart, by William and Ellen Hartley. I am assuming this is the same person. Can anyone enlighten me as to why my grandmother would have written this paper? She resided at Bishop Gray Inn during the time of Deaconess Bedell's stay there.

comment.author: 30307538@N00
comment._content: My grandmother, Florence Smith, was a teacher for most of her life. She did some work with Seminole children and I am thinking that it must have been during the time of her acquaintance with Deaconess Bedell.
